articles.author: Laura He and Rob McLean, CNN Business
articles.title: US and global stocks slide as Putin orders troops into Ukraine. Oil prices near $100 per barrel - CNN
articles.description: Global stock markets tumbled and crude oil prices surged to $99 per barrel on Tuesday after Russia ordered troops into parts of eastern Ukraine.

articles.author: Megan Marples, CNN
articles.title: Happy Twosday! Don't miss out celebrating the coolest date of the decade - CNN
articles.description: Have a terrific Tuesday -- or should we say Twosday -- as we celebrate one of the most special dates of the decade. February 22, 2022, is a palindrome date, meaning it's written the same forward and backward.
